params.maxClaimPrice: Max price willing to pay for claim. Prevents front-running
params.newForSalePrice: Intented new for sale price. Must be within rounding bounds of newContributionRate

LicenseReclaimed(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a license is reclaimed

reclaim(uint256,int96,uint256).notice: Reclaim an inactive license as msg.sender      - Payer bid must be inactive      - Must have permissions to create flow for bidder      - Must have ERC-20 approval of payment token for claimPrice amount

userdoc.notice: Handles reclaiming of licenses that are no longer active
